<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; This header declares the C interface for extra utilities to be used with   &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; the LLJIT class from the llvm-c/LLJIT.h header. It requires to following   &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; link libraries in addition to libLLVMOrcJIT.a:                             &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;  - libLLVMOrcDebugging.a                                                   &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;                                                                            &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; Many exotic languages can interoperate with C code but have a harder time  &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; with C++ due to name mangling. So in addition to C, this interface enables &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; tools written in such languages.                                           &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;                                                                            &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42; Note: This interface is experimental. It is &#42;NOT&#42; stable, and may be       &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;       changed without warning. Only C API usage documentation is           &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;       provided. See the C++ documentation for all higher level ORC API     &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;       details.                                                             &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">|&#42;                                                                            &#42;|</Highlight></CodeLine>
